public class Character
extends BaseCharacter

The Character-class represents a players character.

addExperience

public boolean addExperience(int experience)
Add an amount of experience to the character, and level up if needed. If the character reaches a new level, it's attributes, damage, health, etc. are also increased. Returns a boolean value indicating if the character reached next level.

Parameters:
experience - An amount of experience to be added.
Returns:
True if character reached a new level, or false.

defend

public float defend(Attack attack)
Description copied from interface: ICombat
The implementation of this method describes how the character reacts to, and defends an attack, and returns the real damage actually dealt.

Parameters:
attack - The attack to be defended.
Returns:
A float-value of real damage dealt, which is also the health lost.

drinkPotion

public float drinkPotion()
Drink potion to replenish 50% of maximum health, or no more than maximum health.

Returns:
A float-value indicating how much health was regained.

die

public void die()
Kills the character, effectively resetting it's resources (health and mana).
